specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get 2 attacks from the Furious rule (instead of just 1).
specialRules.name: Bane
specialRules.label: Bane
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get 2 attacks from the Furious rule (instead of just 1).

specialRules.hint: When this model fights in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Unit gets AP(+1).
specialRules.name: Crazed
specialRules.label: Crazed
specialRules.description: When this model fights in melee roll one die and apply one bonus: • 1-2: Unit gets AP(+1).

specialRules.hint: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.
specialRules.name: Headtaker
specialRules.label: Headtaker
specialRules.description: This model gets AP(+2) when fighting units with Tough(3) or higher.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit may move by up to 3” after shooting.
specialRules.name: Hit & Run
specialRules.label: Hit & Run
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit may move by up to 3” after shooting.

specialRules.hint: When this unit is activated pick 2 enemy units within 12”. Those units must take a morale test, if failed they take 3 hits.
specialRules.name: Madness
specialRules.label: Madness
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated pick 2 enemy units within 12”. Those units must take a morale test, if failed they take 3 hits.

specialRules.hint: This unit may block spells as if it had the Wizard(2) special rule.
specialRules.name: Sense Magic
specialRules.label: Sense Magic
specialRules.description: This unit may block spells as if it had the Wizard(2) special rule.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get the Ambush special rule.
specialRules.name: Wild Ambush
specialRules.label: Wild Ambush
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get the Ambush special rule.

spells.name: Spirit Mantle
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Stealth next time it is shot at.

spells.name: Traitor’s Wrath
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(2).

spells.name: Surge
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 3”.

spells.name: Vile Swarm
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 4 automatic hits with AP(1).

spells.name: Animalistic
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -3 to melee rolls next time it fights.

spells.name: Howling Roar
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 12” take 6 automatic hits each.
